_meanings:
{@--2@} A kind of 
fragrant medicinal plant or perfume
({#hrIvera#}).

{@--3@} The embryo or uterus
of a cow.

{1} a spring. 

{2} a natural water-course. 
{3} moss.

the image of the sun reflected in
water.

a landing-place
at a river side.

a pond,
lake, reservoir of water.

{4} the fragrant root
of a plant ({#uSIra#}).

{1} a channel made for
carrying off excess of water, drain,
(<ab>cf.</ab> {#parIvAha#}).

the poison produced at the
churning of the ocean.

playing in water, 
splashing one another with water.

presenting libations
of water to the manes of the 
deceased.

{4} a collective name for several
signs of the zodiac.

a pearl,
shell or any other thing produced
from the sea.

{2}
a metal cup filled with water 
producing harmonic notes like a 
musical glass.

{1} a cloud; {#jAyaMte viralA loke#}
{#jaladA iva sajjanAH#} <ls>Pt. 1. 29.</ls>

{2} a water-fall, descent of a spring
&c. into a river below.

presenting
libations of water to the manes of
the deceased.

a country abounding with
water; {#jalaprAyamanUpaM syAt#} <ls>Ak.</ls>

a
dam, dike, rocks or stones impeding a
current.

a
house erected in the midst of water
(a summer-house) or one supplied
with artificial fountains;  
{#kvacidvicitraM jalayaMtramaMdiraM#} <ls>Rs. 1. 2.</ls>

{2} a drop of water, drizzle,
thin sprinkling.

any change in the waters of rivers
indicating a bad omen.

a small 
waterhouse (rather summer-house) 
furnished with artificial fountains.
